sourcesContent: import React from "react" export default class NoteModalShow extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { display: "block" } } handleClose = () => this.setState({display: "none"}) both = () =>{ this.handleClose() this.props.deleteNote() } textareaHeigth = () => this.props.note?((this.props.note.content.length / 30 + 2) + "em"): "3em" render(){ return(
